message.body: i bet that was a lot of fun!
Yes it was really fun!
Doing anything artsy over break?
That's pretty awesome! Are you looking for incentives or are you fine taking an artsy break?
A tiger shark? Like a living one or like a picture?
like a picture, haha. i might wait til i go back to school and do it in ceramic.
That'd be pretty cool!
yeah. tigersharkz was one of our trivia team names, if you're wondering what it comes from. sadly, he didn't ask me to make a meat wagon.
I'm slightly more confused by the meat wagon. I was just with tiger sharks being pretty bad ass
i actually don't remember how we came up with meat wagon, it just sounds cool.
but i'm glad you can appreciate the power of the tigershark
Haha fair enough. It does sound pretty cool.
you should come with us next year when we play! i'm gonna have to rebuild my team since nar and shan are gone.
I'm so down! But only if you make me a narwhal
that's not how it works, haha. you have to smoke me out to get an animal statue. trivia in itself is inherently rewarding.
wow, really? aren't you just delivering soda?
yeah, that's understandable. and summer will be over before we know it anyway, right?
Yeah it really will. Oh btw after careful consideration I've come to the conclusion that my upcoming laptop purchase will not be a Mac. I'm getting the new XPS12
is that a dell?
Yeah it's a hybrid.
http://xps12.dellmobile.mobi/?ja_campaign=xps+12&ja_source=puba&ja_medium=redirect&ja_content=xps12
woah. that'll be fun to read packets off of.
Haha I'm glad you appreciate the choice. I really like the versatility
for sure. have you owned a pc before?
I had a cement block which was my first laptop. A hand me down from my uncle. A Really old Dell
i imagine it as though it was literally a cinderblock.
It was gray and about 15 pounds. It might as well just been a flattened cinderblock
can you imagine carrying one around for class now? hahaha
I carried it around for debate for a year
i'm sure it went well with your sweater vests. :D
Haha the sweatervests are so perceptually dominant
The cinderblock not so much.
Wait why does your mom think yellow isn't your color?

1) the cinderblock could be thrown at someone if the round isn't going well, that's very dominant 2) she just thinks it looks bad on me. when i was younger she once refused to buy me a sweater i liked because it was yellow. :C

Haha I printed out a lot of my arguments and I had a lot of arguments. So when I had like 4 accordions that was really intimidating. Because nobody can see how many args you have on your computer, but when it's on paper they can tell. The only round it was ridiculous in was this one round my junior year where I pulled out 3 accordions and a computer and my opponent had her laptop and two of her teammates laptops and one accordion.
wait, she had 3 laptops?!
And totally not true. I think yellow looks good on you. Plus you do you haha
it's better now because i'm more tan. but thanks!
It's all that TTL. Yeah lol I guess they didnt have a flash drive and she needed one article from on laptop and she read one arg off her coaches laptop. It was funny.
hahaha, that's awesome. you guys probably looked ridiculous against each other. but very prepared, i guess.
Yeah it would've been better if we both didnt have horrible rounds
but who won?!

She did. I was being young and stupid. I could've consolidated the round and make the argument I was winning the most important in the round but I let her make the argument I was losing on(not by too much) the most important
But no use dwelling on the past right?
true! you have bigger things to focus on now... like ultimate!
And volleyball! I've been playing beach volleyball like 2-3 times a week with this group. It's so much fun
i used to loveee playing volleyball!
You used to play? I never knew that! We should play beach at Clairmont some time
like in middle school i did... i was never very good, even though i enjoyed it. not aggressive or athletic enough to really pursue it.
Ah gotcha. It's a ton of fun. And go figure I'm really competitive hahaha. I'm gonna bring a volleyball to Emory.
i had one under my bed all last year, haha.
What!? How did I never know? Did you know they took the net at Atwood down!
you didn't spend an exceptional amount of time under my bed... but no, i didn't know that.
I'm so aggravated!
okay, i'll be honest, i didn't actually know what net you were referring to.

Oh it was the coolest net ever. It was near the chem building in the grass by that bridge. It was cool because the Chem premed kids would all be freaking out about class and everything and we'd be chilling in the grass
hm. i don't know how i missed that.
It was tucked away down there. It was there freshman year and sometime last year it was gone
so sad. wait, where are you living next year?
I'm living in the XK house
is it on campus?
Yeah it's down near lowers field
like past the vis.arts, out that way?
Yeah exactly. So if you ever need company at work or wanna come chill you're welcome to anytime. And you're at Clairmont right?
yup! in my own apartment. so if you ever need to escape living with a ton of people, you can come somewhere quieter.
Awesome sounds like a good idea if we need to study. I'm so mad though. The Arabic class that Garrett and Sam are in is at the same time as Farsi!
decisions, decisions...
I mean I'm taking Farsi. I wanna SILS Tajik my senior year. Plus out of the two I feel Arabic is someone more accessible to learn later in life than Farsi
Other than the dialects and stuff
more accessible later in life and also less practical, from what i've been learning.
But I wanna be a polyglot! Also I've been practicing my Spanish.... So bad lol
ahhh, we should be speaking in spanish, i'm so out of practice.
hey, no switching up languages on me, bro!
Says the one who switched to English...
Gah sorry my mind is fried. Can we go back to English?
work is just rough and i am running on like no sleep
haha, it's cool. why no sleep?
Just couldn't sleep. I don't really know. I'm fine. It's just a really long day

And now a customer is mad because his order is wrong. We don't put the soda on the truck. We don't key the orders that get out on the truck. And he's yelling at us when now we just hauled 9 40lb syrup tanks into the store and now we have to take them back out.
aw, i'm sorry. people can be such assholes when they don't get what they want.
Yeah like it's ridiculous. I don't get paid enough to get yelled at for shit I didn't do.
Sorry I don't like whining. Lets change subject. How's your day?

whine as much as you want, i won't tell anyone. :) my day is fine, i've done literally nothing productive because i'm not working and the weather's bad. which is why i took a nap, which is why i hadn't responded to your texts.
Thanks it's good to know I have someone to talk to. And I figured that much. That's alright. Did you enjoy your nap?
yeah! it's still raining so i put on a nice acoustic songza station and it was super relaxing.
That sounds like a fantastic nap!
it was. i've been getting up early for this pet-sitting thing so i think i deserved it.
Yeah I wish I could take a nap.... Still at work.
you'll get off soon though, right?
Whenever we finish the route
easy to get behind when dudes are yelling at you, i'd imagine.

Yeah. I mean it's just that. We had 63 24pack waters that by the time we got to the stop where they were going had started collapsing. So we couldn't get the door open. We had to climb into another bay and grab the water from about a 18 inch gap over the top
that sounds difficult.
Yeah we just got back to the plant. That was a FUN day. I know you hate caps so the caps emphasize how much I hated the day
sounds like it was SO FUN. THE FUNNEST. am i doing it properly?
a little overdone but yes. wait I think we have a sarcasm font now
JUST WHAT I ALWAYS WANTED
hey you know we had a difficult time with sarcasm at first
i feel like most people would say i have a difficult time with sarcasm in general.
really who?
nar. and andrew, probably. and definitely katie. and this guy i was dating second semester. i literally never knew when he was being serious, it was horrible.
Awwww sweetheart that was sarcasm
fuck!
yeah I'm just gonna capitalize all of my sarcasm
please. in my defense, i'm really concentrating on jeopardy at the moment.
I'm really mad I missed this episode but that's ok
idk how you would've done, there weren't any questions about t-cells. :)
Rude I've expanded my knowledge
have you been protobowling?
Not really just some reading and shit
i've been so slack. i need to start doing something so i don't forget what little i learned.
Let me know when you get on. We can find a lobby
alien-voting-elevator is the one we use.
Alright good to know
How was jeopardy? Did you win?
yes, i won jeopardy. i was actually appearing on the show today.
You don't keep score? I keep score. I usually lose in final jeopardy because I always try to double up
i can't keep track of two things at once like that. also i never get final jeopardy. except for today.
You should try it. Just a pen and some scrap paper
too much thought. i'm not competitive enough to care.
I find myself more engaged but ok
i was noticing this disparity watching with nar, too. "i don't say the answers aloud unless i don't think other people in the room know it." ehhh.
Yeah haha you may be the only one who does compete lol
who doesn't* compete. that was a quote from her.
That's what I meant to say. Thanks. And yeah you're supposed to internally confirm
internally confirm?
Like keep the answer to yourself and you know it or not
And let others thing about it
eh, we say it aloud in my house and at the cabin, it's just a question of when. house rules are different everywhere, just like pong, haha.
Haha fair enough.
Hey I just got home. Eating dinner with my dad. Brb
Are you still looking for some artistic inspiration!?
yeah, maybe!
How much do you know about American classics tattoos?
like a bit. i know of the style.

I'm thinking about getting a daisy with my grandmothers name Ruth Cote in it. I wanted something in American classic style maybe in like a purple petal color or something. But I wanted to have a few pictures before I go meet a tattoo artist
like her name in a banner around the stem, or...?
I don't know. Banner is very American traditional but I also thought about the stem spelling her name. I don't know. They don't have to be intricate but maybe could you draw up some variations?
yeah, i'll give it a shot.
If you did I would cook for you! I'd make you a fantastic meal.
hmm...
You're the best! Plus now you can break out the markers or colored pencils or pens
yesss. any excuse, haha.
Haha well you're welcome then.
Alps tomorrow!
damn, i'll be out of the house almost all day. i'm sure it'll be good, though.
Oh no that's a shame! :( you haven't seen the race have you?
not really. :( i am a bad tour fan.
Come our Lauren! Btw I said that with the rolled R
hahaha, i know, i suck. did you work today?
Nope only during the weekdays. Luckily.
you do seem to be in a better mood today, haha
Haha yeah I'm usually not that bad. It was just bad. So then me bad
no worries. :) what'd you do with your saturday, then?
It was my bros grad party. Day drinking :D
the best kind of drinking!!!
Actually! Now I'm just home chilling
that sounds like a pretty good day!
Tumblr is da bomb buzzed
oh, hey, quick while you're still buzzed: say something embarrassing i can make fun of you for later
No no no no no
Although I just realized your comment that I never wear clothes is true. I'm not wearing a short
booooo. but eliciting drunk texts is like my favorite thing.
"a short"
You can't elicit.
Shirt whatever drunk me would have made the same mistake
Duck sober me
*fuck
I'm thinking about putting the phone down
there we go. that's the kind of thing i'm talking about ;)
Not fair
it's alright, i've had worse. you're still pretty coherent.
As payback you need to drunk text me
Or I guess reciprocation
you'll have to remind me next time i'm drinking. so good luck with that.
I need to remember gotcha
I'd write it down but you already did for me :)
oh, darn. i guess i will now be forced to drunk text you.
Was that sarcasm? Now I'm strugglin
G
oops, you're right. shoulda been OH DARN
Haha need an excuse to get drunk?
Come to New York! I will take you to party
i wish i could! traveling and partying? too good to be true!
Yeah since you're not doing anything why not? Come on up! I will show you the wonders and blunders of the Hudson valley
what do you want me to do, teleport?
I'd be very impressed. Wait for me to put a shirt on first...
maybe if you were gtl-ing instead of gtt-ing, you'd have a shirt to put on.
My room is very hot. Like A: there is no ac. It's 19th century in this bitch. B: I'm in my room so of course it's hot
SO CLEVER
I know the 19th century comment wasn't good. Besides that there is no need to point out the obvious
you're pushing it, bro. haha. also do you actually not have ac? is there a ceiling fan?
Nope nope. We do have a tower fan but it's burning. Especially on the top bunk
ouch. what's the temp right now?
In my room? No clue. Actually I could probably put a shirt on. But why?
just curious about what the outside temp is. we don't really keep the ac on in my house but i would literally pass away if it was almost 80 at night like now and i couldn't use a ceiling fan.
It's 76 but more likely 83 in my room because we haven't been home all day so the heat just built up
One of the reasons I sleep on the couch sometimes. Also I hate that heat rises. By bed has to be like 4 degrees warmer
which is probably nice in the winter.
Um I sleep shirtless in the winter too lol. Cold doesn't really affect me that much
because you're a northerner. :P
That is correct. I am from the north. Oh I forgot idk how. One of my brothers friends is going to be a gamecock
is he an athlete or something? why would you choose usc?
He's going there for business. Idk.
ohhh, okay. their business school isn't bad.
Haha you can't stand USC can you?
i don't mind it, i know lots of people there, i just don't really understand why you'd come on from out of state for it.
Haha nobody from out of state should experience South Carolina. I told him he'd have to relearn American history
hahahahahaha. true story. starting with the war of northern aggression.
Literally the first thing I said. Haha!
clearly your time spent in the south has taught you at least a couple things!
And time with you.
and your other favorite person, professor canon!
Oh canon canon canon. She comes nowhere close to the paynes or paks of this world
i miss pak! i wish i could've taken her class again next semester.
Haha I was thinking about trying to sneak into structure or just sit in on it
it overlaps with our class, though, doesn't it?
Oh shit you're right. Maybe if our class is cancelled one day
oh yeah, totally. anyway, i'm lame so i'm going to bed. ttylllll
Alright good night! Text yah tomorrow.
Beach volleyball, cliff jumping, and day drinking woo
how is your life so much more exciting than mine?
Because I'm living my life and not really caring about anything haha. Hence you should visit
well, i've done nothing that exciting today and i would if i could. unfortunately i don't actually have the ability to teleport.
Awww you missed the tour too. And well there are plains and trains and such
but unlike teleporting, those things aren't free, haha. and what tour?
Tour de France. And I mean I'm sure when teleporters are invented they won't be free
hahaha, i'm an idiot. and yes, you're probably right about that. which is why i should be working on inventing my own.
I feel your technical education is lacking. But you can certainly communicate with any foreign planets you might wish to teleport too
xenolinguistics, right?
Yeah you got it chica
so what's your day drink of choice, btw?
I had some rolling rocks, some coors lights, and I think like two buds and a bid light
so... beer. haha.
Oh yeah well not many other things you can rock to while volleying or jumping
What'd you do all day?
checked in on the pets i'm sitting, breakfast, church, errands. about to go have dinner at my mom's.
Sounds like a busy day. How was that not fun?
it's my kind of fun, but probably not as fun as what you were doing.
Haha my day has been awesome
Just went to a bros salt water pool and drank some more. So drink
Drunk
bring on the drunk textsss
No you can't get me to drunk text you. That's not fair you haven't been yet
i'm getting your texts on credit, then. :)
Ok so will you send me pretty texts when you're drunk self is pretty
hahaha, what does that even mean?
Sorry drunk tests when your pretty self is drunk
haha, okay. i definitely will, i promise.
Pinky promise?
of course! i never break my promises.
No I believe you. Alright so what should I drunk text you?
that's what your drunk ass has to decide! you can't script elicitation, you know that.
I mean I can't decide
so many things you're dying to tell me... i know how it is.
Oh yes I'm dying to tell you how great my day was.
Or how much I want you to visit
you told me that already!
Well I just want to see you again
you'll see me in the fall. we get to be study buddies again.
Yeah study the brain and language. Chill like we used to. I miss that
yeah, we didn't really spend much time together second semester.
No it was quite unfortunate. I kinda miss you
And by that I'm too too drunk to admit I missed you a lot
that's sweet. i don't want this to sound mean, but you know you're the reason we grew apart, right?
Because I didn't know what I want
And I dated Nariana
haha, yes, i know.
To tell you the truth I fucked up
it wasn't that bad.
No because you made me happy and I was afraid of commitment
you have that issue with most of the girls you date, i think.
(not to mention that it's not like i ever asked you to 'commit' or something...)
I just am afraid of being happy and comfortable. It's difficult for me to feel vulnerable.
i know how that is. we just deal with the problem differently.
I know I usually run away from the problem and become an asshole
everyone knows you're not just an asshole. you do it because you feel like you have to.

I'm just afraid of my own judgment because when I really fell for the first girl I ever really really like she screwed me over. And it's not fair to other people but I'm afraid to really really fall for someone like that again. You know that I'm sorry I ever broke up with you right? Especially he way I did
it's not like it was a bad breakup or something. you don't really need to be sorry. i am sorry that you're hurting because of that first girl, though.
I don't want sympathy I want to stop fucking up my life because I'm afraid ill get hurt again.
i have faith that that's something you're capable of.
It's just terrifying. What's to stop the next person from doing the same thing?

nothing. you just have to remember that your love isn't a finite thing. you can love one person, and be hurt by her, and still go on to love someone else. and you'll be a better person for having those experiences with that first person, regardless of how it ended.

I mean I try to be a romantic. I try to think that there is one person you are meant to with. I can't understand that love is finite. Isn't there someone that you find that you just fit in with like a glove?
not really... there are lots of people with whom you could be in a serious, committed relationship with and be happy with in the long term. but it takes effort, and trust.
I'm willing to out effort in its just sometimes I stop putting effort in becuse I stops having the trust
and therein lies the problem.

I just. I'm afraid. Have you ever really started falling for someone and then had them cheat on you? It's like they don't care how you feel. It's like they don't care about your feelings at all. It's hard to fall for another person again
no, i can honestly say that i don't know what that's like, but i understand that it would hurt. and it would be hard to move on.
It's not hard to move on. It's hard to get into another relationship and make progress
it's the same thing, for me. you're acting out what another relationship is like, but your heart's not in the same way.
Yeah. I just feel bad. I actually care about all the girls I've dated
i don't doubt that.
I just feel so bad I can't give the same level of commitment.
Like you deserve someone who cares about you and will always be there for you
I care but I don't if I can't be there all the time

if you tell yourself you can't, you'll never be able to. and i know that one day you'll be healed enough to give that to someone. but i don't think that person is me and i don't think that time is now, or even very soon.
I never said is was you. I'm just grateful I have someone like you who will listen
Even if these are just drunk epiphanies or rambling a
i'm just making sure it was clear. and hopefully you'll read this tomorrow and it'll still mean something.
I'm going to take this to heart. You're the best for being this supportive
of course i'm being supportive. and thank you for appreciating that.
I always appreciate real and good friends
Wow I feel like I'm am I really depressing drunk
nah, you just got a lot on your mind. clearly you've been doing some thinking.
Hey sorry I got home and pretty much passed out from exhaustion. But thanks a lot for listening. It really does make a world of difference.
i'm glad i could help. hope you're not hungover today! hydrate!
Not hungover but it's so go out
typo?
So hot. Lol. It's like 93 and humid
early in the day to be that warm. i don't care if it gets hot here today, we're seeing sunshine for the first time in a week!!!
Well that's good. Doing anything exciting today?
going back to work! finally. but in the mean time i'm getting coffee at my favorite place. :)
(can you tell i'm in a good mood? haha)
Sounds delicious! Where would that be. And yes you do appear chipper
the single smile café. gotta support local businesses, you know how it is. :D
the chipperness could also be the caffeine...
No I don't because there no longer exists a steady hand :'( RIP
ugh, seriously! it's so unfair.
I'm really aggravated. And I need to get a GPS locator on their truck. Supposedly they have a food truck uhhh... Coffee truck
wait, a steady hand truck?
Yeah that's what I heard when they were closing
that sounds awesome. also food trucks are so trendy now!
I know. But it's not accessible via being right there all the time
yeah. :( also coffee dates don't really work the same way when you're getting it off a truck
Yes but picnics with a coffee surprise are even better!
that's true. having a picnic and/or going to the park is like one of the funnest things ever.
Yeah unfortunately don't have a car so it's sometimes difficult. But I live right on lowers now
there's always lullwater!
That's true too! But I'm afraid that the SH food truck wouldn't be allowed in there
haha, true. beggars can't be choosers, though!
Yes you are correct.
Hey I hope you had a good day at work. Just got home
i did (and i hope you did too)! about to to play trivia, i can text you after if you like.
Yeah I might be in the gym but text me. Good luck!
thanks! have fun!
Thanks same to you
rough night at trivia...
Oh yeah? Porque?
there were a bunch of questions where we felt very certain but were wrong. and a couple where we just didn't know, haha.
Everyone has off days. Perhaps your team needs a swinger. Someone who has a completely different background from yours to prevent the false confidence
yeah... to be honest, we were mostly just undermanned tonight. at full force we have 7 people, but only 4 could come tonight and it was the weakest 4, haha.
Don't consider yourself part of the weakest four. At best that puts you in the middle. And you're way above that
but you don't know the other people!
That's true. But i know you and your modesty
and my realism! :P but anyway, how was the gym?
Didnt go :/ my dad was sore so I came home and made dinner for him
aw, that was sweet of you. what did you make?
Baked potatoes, corn on the cob, and pork tenderloin
yum! i'm coming to your house for dinner tomorrow.
Tomorrow is volleyball night. I won't be cooking. I may cook Wednesday night. You're invited over whenever you want though!
Protobowl?
i have to answer some emory questions real quick, but then i'm up for it. at 10?
i'mma invite nar and steven, too.
and anne!
Sounds perf. Alright cool!
Of course! Party
i see you're already online but i'm gonna reset the score when i'm ready to start.
Yeah that's fine. I'm just seeing how rusty I am
Goodnight thanks for playing!
let's def do it again soon. sad more people couldn't play wif us
Yeah but that's alright. It was super spur of the moment
because we're awesome, spontaneous people.
Truer words have never been said. Except "Bertrand Russell"
NOT TRUE. that's about as true as my good answers today, "the thinker" and "fucking fuck christmas"
How did I miss fucking fuck Christmas?
... it was my third wrong answer to that question. not a proud moment.
I'm still mad about om
them's the breaks, kid.
The nap breaks? How perfectly timed! I think I'm gonna go take a nap
exactly. goodnighttt
Don't you mean good nap? Jeeze knowing my recent insomnia ill be up at 2
Hey good morning :)
good morning!
How're you?
good. about to go buy new flip flops, among other things. mine have a hole in the bottom, haha. how are you?
Oh no! That would be awful. Although you should've just used it as an excuse to not wear shoes
they wouldn't let me into the store to buy more if i didn't wear them!
You could just go barefoot forever!
if only! that would be my kinda life.
Hey sorry had to work. But we just finished our last stop at 2:30. We're awesome
haha, congrats!
Thanks. We're actually taking our hour lunch for once
And I'm home by 4:15. Today was perfect
glad to hear you had a good day!
Except I lost 7 games of volleyball. We dropped a 7 point lead in one of them. Fuck
Bad end to the day.
don't let it ruin your day! and on the plus side... i'm drinking.
Oh well I'm drunk so we should simultaneously drunk text
what are we gonna drunk text about? also why are you drunk?
Also thank The Lord simultaneously is in my autocorrect!
Volleyball and more drunk texting even though I have work. Fuck it
I day drank at volleyball
you've consumed a lot of alcohol recently
It's so I don't have to face reality sober
that's... not good.
text me backkk, i'm bored
Sorry I was figuring out a ride being a good drink and all
Drunk
i can appreciate that. are you home safe?
Almost home
Trying to pretend to be sober
Wher are you?
at my house but about to go hang out with katie. i put pants on and everything!
And shoes? Wow!
yeah, i'm almost like a real person.
That's almost unbelievable except I've seen you all dressed up and cute like
haha, yeah, not a lot of reason for that in summerville, though
Very fancy! Does that count as double fisting or double single fisting?
single. same beverage, same hand, two containers.
Either way I'm impressed
i found it in my house!
Double single frosting skills?
Fisting oh god I'm sorry
How's Katie?
hahaha, fisting. but she's good. we invited her friend brent over and he brought more wine and she's got weed. it's almost a real party. sorry for taking so long to text back, how are you?
I'm starting to sober up. Enjoying tumblr and suits
new suits? a dream come true for you.
you have such a man crush on them
Uhhhhh yes it's completely honest. And like a dream job crush
"professional suit-wearing" zach's dream job
Spending all day with Gabriel Macht and Patrick Adams
And who is house sitting?
me, i just needed a place to go with k and brent. it's a habit we have.
Hahaha oh alright. Some hardcore house sitting
it really is traditional. probably the fourth or fifth time k or i have volunteered a house we're sitting for that purpose.
Wow that's pretty cool I guess haha. Making the most out of work
we do what we can! how are you this morning?
Pretty good. I'm with another driver with whom if we really wanted we could be done by 12
well, did you make it by 12? :)
Haha were taking our time. The temperature is too damn high!
i know that feel. it's 95 out. :(
Yeah same here but about 40% humidity and no ac
i'm sad for you on the no ac front, but only 40%? you need to come work in the lowcountry.
